# zenit-button



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property      | Attribute     | Description                                                                         | Type      | Default     |
| ------------- | ------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `disabled`    | `disabled`    | Whether the button should not be clickable.                                         | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `icon`        | `icon`        | Whether the button should have a 1:1 aspect ratio. This is useful for icon buttons. | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `primary`     | `primary`     | Whether to use primary styling for this button.                                     | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `rounded`     | `rounded`     | Whether to display the button as a rounded rectangle instead of a pill.             | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `transparent` | `transparent` | Whether to use transparent/tertiary styling for this button.                        | `boolean` | `undefined` |
